command:
if [ -f .env ]; then export $(grep GITHUB_PAT .env | xargs) && export GH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_PAT; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #454 - Create build_in_parallel.md command file" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements task 2 of the TAC-12 integration project, creating a slash command for parallel build operations using build-agent subagents.

## Implementation Plan

See: [specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md](specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md)

## Closes

Closes #454

## ADW Tracking

ADW ID: `feature_Tac_12_task_2`

## What Was Done

- ✅ Created comprehensive specification for build_in_parallel command
- ✅ Documented 8-step workflow with detailed file specifications
- ✅ Defined parallel batch execution pattern
- ✅ Specified comprehensive reporting format
- ✅ Updated MCP configuration for Docker command execution

## Key Changes

1. **Specification Document**: Added `specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md` with:
   - Complete command specification based on TAC-12 reference
   - 8-step workflow for parallel build operations
   - Uses `.claude/agents/build-agent.md` subagent
   - Model: claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929
   - Detailed file locations and content specifications

2. **MCP Configuration**: Updated `.mcp.json` to include Docker command execution support

## Wave 1 Progress

This is task 2 of 13 in Wave 1 (New Commands) of the TAC-12 integration project.
EOF
)" --base main
